!ConEmu is distributes as one archive named «`ConEmu.Maximus5.??????.7z`».
This archive contains x86 versions of !ConEmu.exe, ConEmuC.exe and !ConEmuHk.dll,
which are essential part of the product. Theese files works fine in x64 and x86 OS.

The archive contains both x86 and x64 versions of !ConEmu FAR plugins
(«`Plugins\ConEmu\ConEmu.dll`» and «`Plugins\ConEmu\ConEmu.x64.dll`» for example).

So, You can simply unpack downloaded archive to the
[http://www.farmanager.com/download.php?l=en Far Manager] folder.

Download page: http://code.google.com/p/conemu-maximus5/downloads/list
